title: Satisfaction
description: A commitment or economic event that partially or fully satisfies one or more intents.

satisfies.description: An intent satisfied fully or partially by an economic event or commitment.

satisfiedBy.description: A commitment fully or partially satisfying an intent.

satisfiedByEvent.description: An economic event fully or partially satisfying an intent, assumes there was not a commitment satisfying the intent.

satisfiedQuantity.description: The quantity of the satisfaction of a commitment or economic event towards an intent.

under.description: Reference to an agreement between agents which specifies the rules or policies which govern this satisfaction.

$comment: Either satisfiedBy or satisfiedByEvent is also required.
